com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class AppPublics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.AppPublics

  • public final class AppPublics
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathers some interfaces and helpers for the types belonging to its Java package.
    Since:
    2010.01.05
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AppPublics.BroadcastListener
      This interface is a wrapper around a regular Android native BroadcastReceiver, by capturing the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) invocation and implementation is one place.
      static interface  AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider
      States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide a single AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
      static interface  AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider
      States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide several AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
      static class  AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which listens only to UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.
      static interface  AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic
      Because an Android Activity/Fragment entity can be destroyed and then recreated, following a configuration change (a screen orientation change, for instance), this interface gives information about an entity life cycle.
      static class  AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which only watch after UI_LOAD_ACTION UI loading intents action.
      static class  AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler<BusinessObjectClass extends java.io.Serializable>
      A helper which receives multi-selection intents with an action set to AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.SELECTION_ACTION, and which remembers and triggers event according to the current selection.
      static class  AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which only watch after AppPublics#LOAD_ACTION loading intent actions.
      static interface  AppPublics.SendLoadingIntent
      Deprecated. 
      use AppPublics.SendLoadingIntentAnnotation instead
      static interface  AppPublics.SendLoadingIntentAnnotation
      Same concept as AppPublics.SendLoadingIntent, but through an annotation.
      static interface  AppPublics.UseNativeBroadcast
      When applied to the AppPublics.BroadcastListener.getIntentFilter() method, the implementation used will be the native Context.sendBroadcast(Intent) method will be used, instead of the LocalBroadcastManager.sendBroadcast(Intent).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_ACTION_ACTIVITY
      A flag name which indicates the FQN name of the activity class concerned with the action.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_ACTION_COMPONENT
      A flag name which indicates the FQN name of the component class concerned with the action.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_BUSINESS_OBJECT
      An extra which designates a business object.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_UI_LOAD_ACTION_LOADING
      A flag name which indicates whether the loading event is starting or ending.
      static java.lang.String RELOAD_ACTION
      Use this intent action when you need to indicate that an activity should reload its business objects.
      static java.lang.String UI_LOAD_ACTION
      Use this intent action when you need to indicate that something is being loaded.
      static java.lang.String UPDATE_ACTION
      Use this intent action when you need to indicate that an activity should refresh its UI.

      • UI_LOAD_ACTION

        public static java.lang.String UI_LOAD_ACTION
        Use this intent action when you need to indicate that something is being loaded. For indicating that the loading is over, attach the EXTRA_UI_LOAD_ACTION_LOADING key to the Intent.
